nodes.body: dbang sdud, ‘dul ba. Ex: Lha mo dbang sdud dmigs pa (W15508), Rta mgrin dregs pa dbang sdud (W18395), Dbang sdud kyi las mtha’ ‘khrul zhags btad tshad (W9239).
nodes.title: About Rituals to bring [spirits] under one’s control
